name: Next Steps Community Services LLC
specialty: Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Mental Illness

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Next Steps Community Services LLC is a Community Based Residential Treatment Facility, Mental Illness provider based in Bethlehem, NH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $15.6M in Medicaid payments across 7K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $15.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
